oshiSkill.name: リプレイスメント ("Replacement")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Swap one cheer card from your stage to one of your Holomen.

spOshiSkill.name: じゃあ敵だね ("then you're an enemy")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Switch your opponent's center Holomen with one of their back Holomen. Then, for the duration of this turn, your white center Holomen's arts increase by 50.

oshiSkill.name: 左手に地図 ("Map on the left")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable when rolling a die with your Holomen's ability: Declare one number on the die, and treat the next rolled number as the declared number.

spOshiSkill.name: 手にマイク ("Mic On the Right")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Send any number of archived cheer cards to one Green Holomen.

name: Tokino Sora
collabEffect: レッツダンス!: For the duration of this turn, your center Holomen's art gains +20.

skills.name: あなたの心は･･･くもりのち晴れ!

name: Tokino Sora

skills.name: SorAZ シンパシー
skills.description: When you have the Holomen 'AZKI' on your stage, this art gains +50.

extraEffect: When this Holomen is downed, your life is reduced by 2

name: Iris
collabEffect: HOPE!: Look at your Holopower. Reveal one card from among them and add it to your hand. Then, choose one card from your hand and turn it into Holopower.

name: Azki
collabEffect: 広がる地図: You can roll a die once: If the result is 4 or lower, send the top card of your cheer deck to your back Holomen. If the result is 1, you may also move this Holomen to the back position.

skills.name: SorAZ グラビティ
skills.description: When the Holomen 'Tokino Sora' is on your stage, send the top card of your cheer deck to one of your Holomen.

skills.name: デスティニーソング
skills.description: You can roll a die once: If the result is odd, this art gains +50. If the result is 1, this art gains an additional +50.

name: Airani Iofifteen
collabEffect: 一緒にお絵かき!: You may send one White or Green cheer card from your archive to your center Holomen.

name: SorAz

skills.name: 越えたい未来
skills.description: You may roll a die once: If the result is odd, send the top card of your cheer deck to this Holomen. If the result is even, draw one card from your deck.

extraEffect: This Holomen is also treated as 'Tokino Sora' and 'AZKI'

name: Hakui Koyori
collabEffect: SoAzKo: When collaborating with 'Tokino Sora,' draw one card from your deck. When collaborating with 'AZKI,' send the top card of your cheer deck to your center Holomen

name: Manechan
ability: You can only use this card if you have at least one other card in your hand besides this one. Return all cards in your hand to your deck and shuffle. Then, draw 5 cards from your deck.

name: SubComputer
ability: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one LIMITED support card from among them and add it to your hand. Then return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: SuperComputer
ability: You can only use this card if you archive one of your cheers. Reveal one [1st Holomen or 2nd Holomen] card, excluding Buzz, from your deck and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: ホロリスの輪
ability: Roll a die once: If the result is 3 or higher, send one cheer card from your archive to your Holomen

name: First Gravity
ability: You can only use this card if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this one. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Reveal any number of 'Tokino Sora' and 'AZKI' cards from among them and add the revealed Holomen to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
